data.text: @nicd_sa @HealthZA @nhls_sa Well it's clear they don't and positive people are still galavanting around negative people because of the ridiculous rules around covid this alone is a huge disaster waiting to happen especially with the virus still mutating.
@nicd_sa @HealthZA Are you guys also recording the number of people who are having adverse events due to this vaccine? Are you sharing that infoirmation with the public?

@nicd_sa @HealthZA Not clear. By "183 deaths occurred more than 48 hours ago" you mean the 27th February (Sunday) which were reported yesterday the 28th?

And when did the 0 deaths happen? On the 28th February? Secondly, was it reported yesterday the 28th?
@Skatiq3 @HealthZA Please be aware that @nhls_sa is the body responsible for testing. ^NG
@SirGrantFleming @HealthZA We agree! Let's be hopeful the trend continues. ^NG
@AFranzsen Thanks for the ongoing support Arn! ^NG
@jknight316 @HealthZA Thanks for your comment, stay safe. ^NG

@Lucazent @HealthZA Thanks for your interest Lucas. 183 deaths occurred more than 48 hours ago, however it was only reported yesterday. The 0 recorded deaths were for the past 48 hour reporting period. We hope this clears it up. Stay safe ^NG

@nicd_sa @HealthZA I am lost here. When did the 183 deaths and when did the 0 occur? Did both the 183 and 0 happen in  24 hrs of 28 February 2022 or 48 hrs (meaning 27-28 February 2022)?

Kindly it breakdown down for a layman like me
@nicd_sa Your tweet was quoted in an article by News24 https://t.co/3XGZHIntj5
